assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Groundhog Inc. provides mobility intelligence. It offers CovMo, a vanguard system for geo-location; RealMotion solution for public health that enables current and historical mobility insights of the population; and RealMotion solution for tourism intelligence, which enables current and historical mobility insights regarding the near-real-time people's movements. The company also provides MI-DEP, a mobility intelligence data enrichment platform that transforms subscribers' mobility, network usage events, and online and offline transactions into subscriber insights; and MI-DSP, a mobility intelligence demand side platform to launch programmatic mobile advertising services for marketers and advertisers. Its solutions reveal the locations, quality of experience, context, and lifestyles of mobile users in the operator's entire network. The company's carrier-grade platform transforms daily network events and petabytes of data into ubiquitous intelligence. Groundhog Inc. was founded in 2001 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
